control.exe

Windows GUI

Fix Your Computer Settings

MOTW File Explorer
  1. 1. Press Win-R on your keyboard
  2. 2. Type control and press Enter to open the Control Panel
  3. 3. Press Ctrl-L to focus the address bar
  4. 4. Press Ctrl-V to paste our configuration
  5. 5. Press Enter to submit

Documenting Windows system tools for educational and legitimate system administration purposes
